meanings.sent1: I always prewarm my oven before baking cookies.
meanings.sent2: She prewarms her car in the morning before driving to work.
meanings.sent3: The chef prewarmed the pan, but then forgot to add the ingredients!
meanings.sent4: The sun prewarms the earth each morning, preparing it for a new day.
meanings.sent5: Remember to prewarm the baby's bottle before feeding to make it comfortable for them.

meanings.definition: The act of warming something before use.
meanings.sent1: The prewarming of the towels made them cozy for the guests.
meanings.sent2: The prewarming of the engine is essential in cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The prewarming of the seats in the car was a nice surprise on the chilly morning.
meanings.sent4: The prewarming of the house before guests arrived made it feel welcoming.
meanings.sent5: The prewarming of the water in the pool made it more enjoyable for swimming.
